projects.name: Onboard Pro - Developer Onboarding Tool
projects.description: A cross-platform command-line developer onboarding tool written in C# that automates the setup of consistent development environments across Windows, macOS, Ubuntu, and WSL. The tool uses dependency injection for testability, implements platform-specific orchestrators, and provides idempotent onboarding steps. Migrating from a monolithic PowerShell script to a maintainable, testable, and extensible C# architecture.

tasks.name: Iteration 1: Project Scaffolding & Foundational Setup
tasks.details: Completed in PR #2 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/2). Solution/projects scaffolding merged to main with CI green.

tasks.name: Iteration 2: Core Abstractions & Services
tasks.details: Completed in PR #3 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/3). Core abstractions and services merged with green CI.

tasks.name: Iteration 3: Dependency Injection & The Composition Root
tasks.details: Completed in PR #4 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/4). Composition root and orchestrator selection merged with CI success.

tasks.name: Iteration 4: The First Onboarding Step (Git Identity)
tasks.details: Completed in PR #5 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/5). ConfigureGitUserStep plus tooling merged after CI success.

tasks.name: Iteration 5: The First Platform-Aware Step (Install VS Code)
tasks.details: PlatformAware framework and InstallVsCodeStep delivered in PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6). Covered by InstallVsCodeStep NUnit tests and verified with dotnet format/build/test locally. CI run 18850560778 succeeded on main workflow.

tasks.name: Iteration 6: Windows Host Onboarding
tasks.details: Windows orchestrator now exercises all platform-specific steps, and automated coverage (WindowsOrchestratorTests) verifies idempotent behaviour along with failure surfacing. Step-level NUnit suites remain green, and the orchestrator loop was refactored to SequentialOrchestrator for consistent user messaging. Validated via `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Iteration 7: WSL Guest Onboarding
tasks.details: Completed Iteration 7 via PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9): finalized --mode flag parsing, added WSL guest steps (apt update, prerequisites, credential helper) with NUnit coverage, and wired the orchestrator + DI. CI run 18856375172 green.

tasks.name: Iteration 8: macOS & Ubuntu Onboarding
tasks.details: Implement the orchestrators for native macOS and Ubuntu. Create InstallHomebrewStep, InstallBrewPackagesStep for macOS, and InstallAptPackagesStep for Ubuntu. Configure both orchestrators with their respective steps.

tasks.name: Iteration 9: Project Cloning Step
tasks.details: Create the final major onboarding step to clone the project repository. Implement CloneProjectRepoStep with logic to clone or update the repository, handling edge cases like existing non-Git directories.

tasks.name: Iteration 10: Bootstrapper & Release Workflow
tasks.details: Bootstrapper scripts (setup.sh/setup.ps1) finalized with environment overrides, and the release workflow now uploads platform binaries from absolute workspace paths; the follow-up CI run for PR #13 succeeded. Validated end-to-end via `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, and GitHub Actions run 18859342536 on 2025-10-27.

tasks.name: Iteration 11: Final Documentation and Polish
tasks.details: Final documentation delivered (README.md quick-starts, architecture overview), user messaging polished through SequentialOrchestrator, and top-level error handling hardened with OnboardingStepException plus ProcessRunner resilience. Verified by `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, and manual README review on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Create the Root Directory and Solution
tasks.details: Create onboard-pro directory and initialize .NET solution. Run: dotnet new sln -n Onboard

tasks.name: Initialize .NET Projects
tasks.details: Create all three projects: Onboard.Console (console app), Onboard.Core (class library), and Onboard.Core.Tests (nunit test project) in their respective directories.

tasks.name: Link Projects to Solution
tasks.details: Add all three projects to the solution using dotnet sln add commands.

tasks.name: Establish Project References
tasks.details: Set up project references: Onboard.Console references Onboard.Core, and Onboard.Core.Tests references Onboard.Core.

tasks.name: Install NuGet Packages
tasks.details: Install Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting for Onboard.Console and Moq for Onboard.Core.Tests using dotnet add package commands.

tasks.name: Create Directory Structure
tasks.details: Create complete directory structure: Orchestrators/, Abstractions/, Models/, Services/, Steps/ with subdirectories (Shared/, PlatformAware/, Windows/, WslGuest/, MacOs/).

tasks.name: Configure Dev Container
tasks.details: Create .devcontainer/devcontainer.json configured to use mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/dotnet:1-9.0-bookworm image with proper extensions and settings.

tasks.name: Define Models
tasks.details: Create ProcessResult and PlatformFacts records in Models/ folder with all required properties and enums (OperatingSystem, Architecture).

tasks.name: Define Abstractions (Interfaces)
tasks.details: Create all core interfaces: IProcessRunner, IUserInteraction, IPlatformDetector, IOnboardingStep, IPlatformOrchestrator in Abstractions/ folder.

tasks.name: Implement Concrete Services
tasks.details: Implement ProcessRunner using System.Diagnostics.Process, ConsoleUserInteraction with colored output, and PlatformDetector using RuntimeInformation and WSL environment variable detection.

tasks.name: Implement Program.cs with DI
tasks.details: Replace Program.cs with DI configuration, register all services, create placeholder orchestrators (WindowsOrchestrator, MacOsOrchestrator, UbuntuOrchestrator, WslGuestOrchestrator), and implement platform-based orchestrator selection.

tasks.name: Create Placeholder Orchestrators
tasks.details: Create empty placeholder orchestrator classes with empty ExecuteAsync methods to validate DI registration works correctly.

tasks.name: Test Platform Detection and Orchestrator Selection
tasks.details: Test the application runs correctly on current platform, detects OS/architecture, selects appropriate orchestrator, and exits gracefully.

tasks.name: Implement ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Implement ConfigureGitUserStep.cs in Steps/Shared/ with ShouldExecuteAsync checking git config, and ExecuteAsync prompting user and setting git config values.

tasks.name: Write Unit Tests for ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Create ConfigureGitUserStepTests.cs with tests for happy path (missing config), skip path (config exists), and verify Moq usage for IProcessRunner and IUserInteraction.

tasks.name: Update Orchestrators with ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Update all orchestrators to inject ConfigureGitUserStep and add it to their steps collection. Verify it runs correctly.

tasks.name: Implement PlatformAwareStep Base Class
tasks.details: Implemented PlatformAwareStep base class in src/Onboard.Core/Steps/PlatformAware/PlatformAwareStep.cs with strategy registration and execution helpers. Covered by InstallVsCodeStep unit tests in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/InstallVsCodeStepTests.cs. Shipped via PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6) with green CI (run 18850560778).

tasks.name: Implement InstallVsCodeStep
tasks.details: Implemented InstallVsCodeStep with winget/brew/apt strategies and idempotent detection using IProcessRunner in src/Onboard.Core/Steps/PlatformAware/InstallVsCodeStep.cs, added DI wiring in all orchestrators, and created NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/InstallVsCodeStepTests.cs. Delivered in PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6) with CI run 18850560778 succeeding.

tasks.name: Create Windows-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Implemented EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, and InstallDockerDesktopStep under src/Onboard.Core/Steps/Windows/. Added NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/Windows/*. Shipped via PR #7 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/7) with local dotnet format/build/test passing. WSL step only verifies prerequisites and prints manual instructions as requested.

tasks.name: Update WindowsOrchestrator with All Steps
tasks.details: WindowsOrchestrator now injects EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, InstallVsCodeStep, InstallDockerDesktopStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep in order, powered by the new DI registrations in Program.cs.

tasks.name: Test Windows Host Onboarding
tasks.details: Covered Windows orchestrator behaviour with automated tests (WindowsOrchestratorTests) using a controlled process runner to simulate pre-configured machines and failure paths. The tests confirm steps remain idempotent and surface contextual errors and are executed via `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Finalize --mode Flag Parsing
tasks.details: Introduced CommandLineOptionsParser with robust --mode parsing (supports --mode wsl-guest and --mode=wsl-guest, rejects duplicates/invalid values) and wired it into Program.cs to show friendly errors. Added NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Services/CommandLineOptionsParserTests.cs. Verified via dotnet build and dotnet test. Landed in PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8) with CI run 18855944783 succeeding before squash merge. Task complete.

tasks.name: Create WSL-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Implemented AptUpdateStep, InstallWslPrerequisitesStep, and ConfigureWslGitCredentialHelperStep under src/Onboard.Core/Steps/WslGuest with NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/WslGuest/*. Verified locally via dotnet build/test and merged into PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9). CI run 18856375172 for PR #9 succeeded.

tasks.name: Update WslGuestOrchestrator with All Steps
tasks.details: Wired AptUpdateStep, InstallWslPrerequisitesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureWslGitCredentialHelperStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep into WslGuestOrchestrator with matching DI registrations in Program.cs. Changes shipped via PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9) with CI run 18856375172 succeeding.

tasks.name: Create macOS-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Create InstallHomebrewStep checking for brew on PATH. Create InstallBrewPackagesStep to install git, gh, chezmoi via brew.

tasks.name: Create Ubuntu-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Create InstallAptPackagesStep for Ubuntu to install git, gh, curl, chezmoi, python3, build-essential via apt-get.

tasks.name: Update macOS & Ubuntu Orchestrators
tasks.details: Update MacOsOrchestrator with InstallHomebrewStep, InstallBrewPackagesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureGitUserStep. Update UbuntuOrchestrator with AptUpdateStep, InstallAptPackagesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureGitUserStep.

tasks.name: Implement CloneProjectRepoStep
tasks.details: Implement CloneProjectRepoStep.cs in Steps/Shared/ with logic to check if directory exists, if it's a Git repo, clone new repo or git pull if exists. Handle parent directory creation.

tasks.name: Update Orchestrators with CloneProjectRepoStep
tasks.details: Add CloneProjectRepoStep to MacOsOrchestrator, UbuntuOrchestrator, and WslGuestOrchestrator as final step before docs. Test end-to-end.

tasks.name: Create setup.sh Bootstrapper
tasks.details: Implemented cross-platform bootstrapper at setup.sh. Script now detects host OS/arch, queries GitHub Releases for Onboard-${os}-${arch} assets, downloads with curl, and executes with args passthrough. Supports ONBOARD_REPOSITORY/ONBOARD_RELEASE_TAG/ONBOARD_KEEP_DOWNLOADED_BINARY env overrides and cleans temp files unless preserve flag set. Validated via dotnet build && dotnet test.

tasks.name: Create setup.ps1 Bootstrapper
tasks.details: Extended setup.ps1 to honor ONBOARD_RELEASE_TAG and ONBOARD_KEEP_DOWNLOADED_BINARY environment variables while retaining parameter overrides. Cleanup flow now reuses a computed preserve flag so temp executables are removed by default and preserved only when requested. Exercised dotnet build && dotnet test to ensure repo remains healthy.

tasks.name: Create GitHub Actions Release Workflow
tasks.details: Reworked .github/workflows/release.yml into a matrix build covering win-x64, osx-x64, osx-arm64, and linux-x64. Each job publishes a self-contained single-file binary, renames it to a platform-specific asset (e.g. Onboard-linux-x64), uploads a workflow artifact, and attaches the asset to tagged releases. Generate_release_notes now runs once on the Windows leg. Verified solution health with dotnet build && dotnet test.

tasks.name: Create README.md
tasks.details: Expanded README.md with quick-start bootstrap instructions, architecture overview, release workflow summary, and development commands. Validated via `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` and `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`.

tasks.name: Review User-Facing Text
tasks.details: Standardized orchestrator output by introducing SequentialOrchestrator, ensuring consistent "Checking/Running/Already configured" messages and uniform completion headers across platforms. Verified user messaging via new automated coverage in WindowsOrchestratorTests, executed with `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Error Handling Review
tasks.details: Added top-level exception handling in Program.Main to convert onboarding failures into friendly error output and non-zero exit codes, and introduced OnboardingStepException so individual steps bubble contextual failures. ProcessRunner now gracefully returns a failure ProcessResult when launches fail. Validated via `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Update WindowsOrchestrator wiring
tasks.details: Updated WindowsOrchestrator to execute EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, InstallVsCodeStep, InstallDockerDesktopStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep, and registered the new steps in Program.cs for dependency injection.

tasks.name: Author Windows bootstrap scripts
tasks.details: Handled via PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8). Added setup.ps1 to fetch the latest Windows release asset, executes it with arg passthrough, and introduced a stub setup.sh directing users to the PowerShell bootstrapper. Workflow run 18854470533 passed.

tasks.name: Create CI release pipeline
tasks.details: Completed in PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8). Added .github/workflows/release.yml which publishes a win-x64 self-contained executable, stores it as a workflow artifact, and attaches it to tagged releases. CI run 18854470533 is green.

tasks.name: Validate setup.ps1 against legacy script
tasks.details: Validated the new setup.ps1 against legacy-codebase/setup.ps1, added execution policy bypass helper, and corrected default repo slug in commit e98d039 (PR #8). Confirmed parity of download, checksum, and launch behavior.

tasks.name: Automate Docker Desktop WSL integration
tasks.details: Automated Docker Desktop WSL integration in InstallDockerDesktopStep (commit e98d039, PR #8), including settings-store.json updates and NUnit coverage. Verified via dotnet test and CI run 18855257300.

tasks.name: Produce Windows release artifact
tasks.details: Tagged commit e98d039 with v0.1.0, pushed to origin, and verified release workflow run 18855448753 succeeded. Artifact windows-executable (id 4386759021) and release asset Onboard-win-x64.exe published at https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/releases/tag/v0.1.0.

tasks.name: Create README.md
tasks.details: Duplicate of Create README.md; README already updated and validated with `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Create README.md
tasks.details: Duplicate entry; README.md already completed and tested (`dotnet build` / `dotnet test`).

tasks.name: Implement dry run mode
tasks.details: Add a command-line flag to enable a dry-run execution that reports which steps would run without invoking process commands. Update parsing, dependency injection, and orchestration logic, add unit tests, and document the new option.

tasks.name: Iteration 12: Reliability and Diagnostics
tasks.details: Deliver reliability enhancements outlined in prds/iterations.md by hardening process execution and adding persistent logging. Scope includes injecting DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive on Linux hosts, wiring Serilog file sinks into Onboard.Console, and ensuring ProcessRunner and ConsoleUserInteraction produce detailed diagnostics without overwhelming end users. Acceptance: updated unit coverage, verified logs written to OS-specific temp paths, dry-run semantics unchanged.

tasks.name: 00 Pre-flight & Identity
tasks.details: Confirm Iteration 12 prerequisites: review logging design notes, ensure Serilog packages are approved, and capture current ProcessRunner behaviours for regression comparison.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Translate reliability goals into a concrete plan: schedule Serilog introduction, map logging targets per OS, and align test strategy with QA.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-12"
tasks.details: Create working branch iter-12 from main so reliability and diagnostics changes stay isolated until review.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize reliability & diagnostics plan
tasks.details: Document sequence for adding Serilog, updating ProcessRunner, and touching ConsoleUserInteraction; capture testing and rollback strategy before coding.

tasks.name: 20 Build
tasks.details: Implement code changes for Iteration 12 across ProcessRunner, logging configuration, and console interaction surfaces.

tasks.name: 20.10 Add DEBIAN_FRONTEND injection to ProcessRunner
tasks.details: Update ProcessRunner to set DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive for Linux commands per Iteration 12 spec; ensure env var is merged without overwriting existing values.

tasks.name: 20.20 Integrate Serilog file logging pipeline
tasks.details: Add Serilog and Serilog.Sinks.File to Onboard.Console, configure host builder to write to per-OS log files, and ensure ILogger<T> is available to ProcessRunner and ConsoleUserInteraction.

tasks.name: 20.30 Instrument ProcessRunner command logging
tasks.details: Inject ILogger<ProcessRunner> into ProcessRunner, log command, arguments, exit codes, and truncated stdout/stderr at Debug level, honoring dry-run behaviour.

tasks.name: 20.40 Extend ConsoleUserInteraction for transcript logging
tasks.details: Update ConsoleUserInteraction to accept ILogger, mirror all user-facing messages to the logger, and preserve colorized console experience per Iteration 12 requirements.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-12
tasks.details: Complete all coding tasks for Iteration 12 on branch iter-12, ensuring ProcessRunner, logging configuration, and ConsoleUserInteraction updates compile together.

tasks.name: 30 Integration
tasks.details: Coordinate integration work: ensure DI registrations, logging configuration, and cross-platform behaviours align before PR.

tasks.name: 30.10 Open PR: iter-12
tasks.details: Open a draft PR for iter-12 once local changes and baseline validation are complete.

tasks.name: 30.20 Verify CI checks
tasks.details: Ensure the iter-12 PR triggers main CI workflows and verify Serilog package restore and updated tests succeed in automation.

tasks.name: 30.30 Resolve review feedback
tasks.details: Address reviewer comments for iter-12, especially around logging verbosity, configuration defaults, and dependency management.

tasks.name: 30.40 Validate DI wiring and log paths across platforms
tasks.details: Manually exercise Windows, macOS, and Linux execution paths (via unit/integration coverage or targeted runs) to confirm Serilog configuration writes logs to the intended temp directories.

tasks.name: 40 Validation & Delivery
tasks.details: Validate Iteration 12 updates via automated tests, manual smoke passes, and release readiness checks.

tasks.name: 40.10 Local lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format, dotnet build, dotnet test, and the orchestrator dry-run to ensure ProcessRunner logging doesnt break existing behaviour.

tasks.name: 40.20 Expand unit coverage for logging changes
tasks.details: Add NUnit coverage for ProcessRunner logging decisions and ConsoleUserInteraction logger integration; validate Serilog configuration via unit/integration hooks.

tasks.name: 40.30 Manual smoke test for log capture
tasks.details: Perform on-device run of Onboard Pro to confirm log file creation, content redaction, and location messaging align with troubleshooting story.

tasks.name: 40.40 Squash/merge PR
tasks.details: Once approvals land, squash-merge iter-12 into main, ensuring release notes capture logging upgrades.

tasks.name: 50 Docs & Comms
tasks.details: Update documentation and communications to reflect Iteration 12 logging and diagnostics improvements.

tasks.name: 50.10 Post-merge validation + README updates
tasks.details: After merging iter-12, pull main locally, run smoke tests, and update README/troubleshooting sections with new logging guidance.

tasks.name: 50.20 Update troubleshooting guidance for diagnostics
tasks.details: Add documentation covering log file locations, retention expectations, and instructions for attaching logs to support tickets.

tasks.name: 50.30 Share diagnostics rollout update
tasks.details: Send release summary to stakeholders/slack covering new logging behaviour, how to retrieve logs, and next steps for observability.

tasks.name: Iteration 13: Refactoring Platform-Aware Steps
tasks.details: Execute prds/iterations.md Iteration 13 plan to replace the PlatformAwareStep abstraction with discrete VS Code installation steps. Deliverables: platform-specific InstallVsCode steps with tests, updated DI wiring, orchestrator adjustments, and removal of the legacy base class.

tasks.name: 00 Pre-flight & Identity
tasks.details: Audit existing PlatformAwareStep usage, confirm InstallVsCodeStep coverage, and capture baseline orchestrator wiring before refactor.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Define the refactor plan for decomposing InstallVsCodeStep, sequencing orchestrator updates, and coordinating unit test changes.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-13"
tasks.details: Branch from main to iter-13 for the platform-aware refactor to preserve mainline stability.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize platform-step decomposition plan
tasks.details: Document target APIs for InstallWindowsVsCodeStep, InstallMacVsCodeStep, and InstallLinuxVsCodeStep plus the orchestration wiring changes and testing expectations.

tasks.name: 20 Build
tasks.details: Implement Iteration 13 refactor: create platform-specific VS Code steps, update DI, and remove legacy abstractions.

tasks.name: 20.10 Implement InstallWindowsVsCodeStep
tasks.details: Create Windows-specific VS Code installer step with winget logic and idempotent PATH checks; port tests from existing InstallVsCodeStep.

tasks.name: 20.20 Implement InstallMacVsCodeStep
tasks.details: Create macOS-specific VS Code step using brew logic, covering PATH/app bundle detection and tests mirroring legacy behaviour.

tasks.name: 20.30 Implement InstallLinuxVsCodeStep
tasks.details: Create Linux-specific VS Code installation step with curl/apt flow and tests ensuring dry-run + idempotent detection preserve legacy behaviour.

tasks.name: 20.40 Remove PlatformAwareStep abstraction
tasks.details: Delete PlatformAwareStep.cs and related utilities once all orchestrators reference the new platform-specific steps; clean up namespace references.

tasks.name: 20.50 Update Program.cs dependency injection
tasks.details: Register new platform-specific VS Code steps in Program.cs and remove the old InstallVsCodeStep registration.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-13
tasks.details: Finalize all code edits for the platform-aware refactor on iter-13 branch, ensuring solution builds locally.

tasks.name: 30 Integration
tasks.details: Coordinate orchestrator updates, ensure tests and DI align after removing PlatformAwareStep, and prep PR for review.

tasks.name: 30.10 Open PR: iter-13
tasks.details: Publish iter-13 PR with refactor notes and highlight removed PlatformAwareStep components.

tasks.name: 30.20 Verify CI checks
tasks.details: Confirm iter-13 PR passes formatting, build, and test workflows with new platform-specific steps.

tasks.name: 30.30 Resolve review feedback
tasks.details: Address reviewer comments for iter-13, focusing on duplicated logic and test coverage parity.

tasks.name: 30.40 Align orchestrators with new VS Code steps
tasks.details: Update Windows, MacOs, Ubuntu, and WslGuest orchestrators to inject the appropriate platform-specific VS Code step and validate sequence order.

tasks.name: 40 Validation & Delivery
tasks.details: Validate refactor through automated/unit coverage, regression tests, and release preparation before merge.

tasks.name: 40.10 Local lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format, dotnet build, dotnet test, and orchestrator dry-run to ensure new VS Code steps behave across modes.

tasks.name: 40.20 Update VS Code step unit tests
tasks.details: Create dedicated NUnit coverage for InstallWindowsVsCodeStep, InstallMacVsCodeStep, and InstallLinuxVsCodeStep; retire legacy shared tests.

tasks.name: 40.30 Regression sweep for orchestrators
tasks.details: Manually exercise each orchestrator to verify VS Code step substitution works and messaging remains consistent.

tasks.name: 40.40 Squash/merge PR
tasks.details: After approvals and validation, squash-merge iter-13 into main to ship the platform-aware refactor.

tasks.name: 50 Docs & Comms
tasks.details: Document refactor outcomes and broadcast step changes to teams relying on onboarding flows.

tasks.name: 50.10 Post-merge validation + README updates
tasks.details: Pull main after iter-13 merge, confirm builds/tests still green, and update README/developer docs to describe new VS Code step classes.

tasks.name: 50.20 Update architecture notes for platform steps
tasks.details: Refresh internal architecture/design documentation to reflect removal of PlatformAwareStep and rationale for platform-specific classes.

tasks.name: 50.30 Share refactor summary
tasks.details: Announce Iteration 13 completion to stakeholders with highlights on maintainability improvements and new testing strategy.

tasks.name: Iteration 14: Centralized Configuration
tasks.details: Implement Iteration 14 from prds/iterations.md by introducing OnboardingConfiguration, registering it with DI, and updating steps to consume shared values instead of hard-coded strings.

tasks.name: 00 Pre-flight & Identity
tasks.details: Inventory hard-coded configuration values in the codebase and capture stakeholder expectations for centralized configuration defaults.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Design the OnboardingConfiguration model and rollout plan, including DI registration and migration of existing step constants.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-14"
tasks.details: Branch iter-14 from main to encapsulate configuration centralization work.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize configuration rollout plan
tasks.details: Define property set for OnboardingConfiguration (WslDistroName, WslDistroImage, etc.), migration strategy, and testing checkpoints.

tasks.name: 20 Build
tasks.details: Implement centralized configuration model, DI registration, and step updates for Iteration 14.

tasks.name: 20.10 Create OnboardingConfiguration model
tasks.details: Add OnboardingConfiguration record with default values (e.g., WslDistroName/Image) in Onboard.Core.Models per iteration plan.

tasks.name: 20.20 Register OnboardingConfiguration in Program.cs
tasks.details: Add configuration singleton registration with default values and expose it via DI for steps needing shared constants.

tasks.name: 20.30 Update EnableWslFeaturesStep to use configuration
tasks.details: Inject OnboardingConfiguration into EnableWslFeaturesStep and replace hard-coded distro values with configuration properties.

tasks.name: 20.40 Update InstallDockerDesktopStep to use configuration
tasks.details: Inject OnboardingConfiguration into InstallDockerDesktopStep and replace hard-coded settings-store references with configuration-backed values.

tasks.name: 20.50 Audit remaining steps for configuration opportunities
tasks.details: Review other steps for hard-coded values (e.g., repo URLs) and document follow-up opportunities or migrate simple cases now if low risk.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-14
tasks.details: Complete all coding changes for centralized configuration on iter-14 branch ensuring builds succeed locally.

tasks.name: 30 Integration
tasks.details: Ensure configuration model is wired through orchestrators, prepare communication, and organize PR review flow for Iteration 14.

tasks.details: Open iter-14 PR summarizing centralized configuration changes and testing coverage.

tasks.name: 30.20 Verify CI checks
tasks.details: Ensure iter-14 PR passes CI builds/tests and that configuration model is restored correctly in pipelines.

tasks.name: 30.30 Resolve review feedback
tasks.details: Respond to reviewer comments for iter-14, ensuring configuration defaults and DI patterns meet expectations.

tasks.name: 30.40 Verify configuration usage across orchestrators
tasks.details: Run targeted checks to ensure orchestrators and steps consume OnboardingConfiguration without regressions, updating dependency injection as needed.

tasks.name: 40 Validation & Delivery
tasks.details: Validate centralized configuration via automated tests, manual smoke tests, and release readiness for Iteration 14.

tasks.name: 40.10 Local lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format/build/test and dry-run orchestrator to ensure configuration injection paths are healthy.

tasks.name: 40.20 Update unit tests for configuration consumers
tasks.details: Add/adjust tests for EnableWslFeaturesStep and InstallDockerDesktopStep to verify usage of OnboardingConfiguration defaults.

tasks.name: 40.30 Manual smoke test for configuration defaults
tasks.details: Run Onboard Pro on Windows host scenario to confirm configuration-driven values (e.g., WSL distro names) behave correctly.

tasks.name: 40.40 Squash/merge PR
tasks.details: After validation and approvals, squash-merge iter-14 into main and tag the centralized configuration change.

tasks.details: Document centralized configuration defaults, update troubleshooting docs, and announce Iteration 14 completion.

tasks.details: After merging iter-14, pull main, re-run smoke tests, and update README/config docs with new OnboardingConfiguration defaults.

tasks.name: 50.20 Update troubleshooting docs for configuration
tasks.details: Document how to adjust OnboardingConfiguration defaults and where to look when diagnosing WSL or Docker changes.

tasks.name: 50.30 Share configuration rollout announcement
tasks.details: Notify stakeholders of Iteration 14 completion, highlighting centralized configuration benefits and how to request adjustments.

tasks.name: Iteration 15: Enhanced Interactive Debugging
tasks.details: Deliver Iteration 15 enhancements from prds/iterations.md by adding a --verbose CLI flag, extending IUserInteraction with debug output, instrumenting ProcessRunner for verbose/dry-run transparency, and improving SequentialOrchestrator dry-run messaging.

tasks.name: 00 Pre-flight & Identity
tasks.details: Review current command-line options, IUserInteraction capabilities, and ProcessRunner diagnostics to baseline verbosity behaviour before Iteration 15.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Plan verbose mode UX, debug messaging, and dry-run behaviour changes per Iteration 15 specs.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-15"
tasks.details: Branch iter-15 from main to isolate verbose/interactive debugging work.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize verbose & dry-run plan
tasks.details: Define UX for --verbose flag, debug messaging palette, and dry-run messaging updates; document acceptance criteria.

tasks.name: 20 Build
tasks.details: Implement verbose mode flag, IUserInteraction debug output, ProcessRunner instrumentation, and SequentialOrchestrator dry-run updates for Iteration 15.

tasks.name: 20.10 Implement --verbose flag parsing
tasks.details: Update CommandLineOptions, parser, and ExecutionOptions to support --verbose/-v per Iteration 15 requirements.

tasks.name: 20.20 Extend IUserInteraction for debug output
tasks.details: Add WriteDebug method, update interface implementations, and ensure ExecutionOptions is available for conditional verbosity.

tasks.name: 20.30 Update ConsoleUserInteraction for verbose mode
tasks.details: Inject ExecutionOptions/ILogger into ConsoleUserInteraction, emit debug messages when --verbose is active, and style them per UX guidelines.

tasks.name: 20.40 Enhance ProcessRunner verbose instrumentation
tasks.details: Inject ExecutionOptions and IUserInteraction into ProcessRunner to print command transcripts when verbose or dry-run modes are enabled, including stdout/stderr dumps.

tasks.name: 20.50 Improve SequentialOrchestrator dry-run messaging
tasks.details: Update SequentialOrchestrator to surface simulated command execution when dry-run + verbose is active, leveraging ProcessRunner instrumentation.

tasks.name: 20.60 Wire verbose mode dependencies
tasks.details: Update Program.cs registrations so ExecutionOptions, IUserInteraction, and ProcessRunner receive the verbose flag and necessary injections.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-15
tasks.details: Complete verbose mode implementation work on iter-15 branch ensuring solution builds succeed.

tasks.name: 30 Integration
tasks.details: Integrate verbose-mode changes across orchestrators, prep PR, and coordinate review for Iteration 15.

tasks.name: 30.10 Open PR: iter-15
tasks.details: Publish iter-15 PR summarizing verbose/debugging enhancements and UX impacts.

tasks.name: 30.20 Verify CI checks
tasks.details: Ensure iter-15 PR passes format/build/test workflows with verbose flag coverage.

tasks.name: 30.30 Resolve review feedback
tasks.details: Address reviewer feedback for iter-15 around verbose messaging and UX details.

tasks.name: 30.40 Validate verbose messaging integration
tasks.details: Run targeted scenarios to confirm verbose and dry-run messaging alignment across orchestrators and update UX polish doc if gaps remain.

tasks.name: 40 Validation & Delivery
tasks.details: Validate verbose/dry-run enhancements via automated coverage, manual smoke tests, and final merge rituals for Iteration 15.

tasks.name: 40.10 Local lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Execute dotnet format/build/test and run orchestrator dry-run with --verbose to validate output pipeline.

tasks.name: 40.20 Update unit tests for verbose behaviours
tasks.details: Add coverage for CommandLineOptionsParser, ProcessRunner, and SequentialOrchestrator to assert verbose flag behaviour and dry-run transcripts.

tasks.name: 40.30 Manual verbose-mode smoke test
tasks.details: Run Onboard Pro end-to-end with --verbose on multiple scenarios to ensure debug output is actionable and not overwhelming.

tasks.name: 40.40 Squash/merge PR
tasks.details: After approvals and validation, squash-merge iter-15 into main and capture verbose-mode notes.

tasks.name: 50 Docs & Comms
tasks.details: Update documentation and communications to explain verbose mode usage and debugging workflows for Iteration 15.

tasks.name: 50.10 Post-merge validation + README updates
tasks.details: After merging iter-15, pull main, verify --verbose behaviour on release build, and update README/debugging docs.

tasks.name: 50.20 Update troubleshooting & UX docs
tasks.details: Document verbose flag usage, log locations, and recommended debugging workflow in README and ux_polish references.

tasks.name: 50.30 Share verbose-mode release notes
tasks.details: Communicate Iteration 15 completion to stakeholders, emphasizing new debugging capabilities and how to enable verbose mode.

tasks.name: Iteration 16: UX Polish (Spectre.Console Integration)
tasks.details: Implement the UX polish design in prds/ux_polish.md by introducing a Spectre.Console-driven user experience. Scope includes upgrading IUserInteraction abstractions, moving console-specific presentation to Onboard.Console, adding rich status spinners and summaries, and ensuring tests cover the new interaction model.

tasks.name: 00 Pre-flight & Identity
tasks.details: Review ux_polish.md requirements, audit current ConsoleUserInteraction usage, and capture baseline CLI experience before refactor.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Produce an execution plan for Spectre.Console integration: abstraction changes, dependency moves, testing strategy, and risk mitigation.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-16"
tasks.details: Branch from main to iter-16 to isolate Spectre.Console UX polish work.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize Spectre.Console rollout plan
tasks.details: Document sequencing for IUserInteraction upgrades, SpectreUserInteraction creation, StepResult tracking, and testing updates; share plan with stakeholders.

tasks.name: 20 Build
tasks.details: Implement Spectre.Console UX polish: abstraction upgrades, console presentation refactor, orchestrator instrumentation, and dependency registration.

tasks.name: 20.10 Upgrade IUserInteraction abstraction
tasks.details: Expand IUserInteraction with rich output, prompts, status context, and summary APIs per ux_polish.md; define IStatusContext and new StepResult model contracts in Onboard.Core.

tasks.name: 20.20 Create SpectreUserInteraction
tasks.details: Relocate console-specific interaction into Onboard.Console, implement SpectreUserInteraction with Spectre.Console status, prompts, welcome banner, and semantic color markup.

tasks.name: 20.30 Track StepResult history
tasks.details: Introduce StepResult/StepStatus records, persist execution outcomes in SequentialOrchestrator, and emit semantic markup for executed vs skipped vs failed steps.

tasks.name: 20.40 Integrate status spinner orchestration
tasks.details: Wrap SequentialOrchestrator execution in IUserInteraction.RunStatusAsync, update step lifecycle messaging, and ensure spinner pauses cleanly for prompts.

tasks.name: 20.50 Register Spectre dependencies
tasks.details: Update Program.cs to inject SpectreUserInteraction, Spectre.Console services, and ensure Onboard.Core stays console-agnostic while Onboard.Console references Spectre.

tasks.name: 20.60 Adapt step implementations to new IUserInteraction
tasks.details: Refactor existing onboarding steps to use upgraded IUserInteraction methods (Ask/Confirm, summary details) without breaking platform-specific logic.

tasks.name: 20.70 Add Spectre.Console testing harness
tasks.details: Add Spectre.Console.Testing support, create unit tests for SpectreUserInteraction output, and ensure abstraction mocks in Onboard.Core.Tests compile.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-16
tasks.details: Finalize Spectre.Console UX polish implementation on branch iter-16, ensuring all code compiles and primary unit tests pass locally.

tasks.name: 30 Integration
tasks.details: Coordinate Spectre.Console UX rollout: align DI, verify multi-platform behaviours, and prepare review materials.

tasks.name: 30.10 Open PR: iter-16
tasks.details: Publish draft PR for Spectre.Console UX polish capturing UX demos, screenshots, and architecture notes.

tasks.name: 30.20 Verify CI checks
tasks.details: Ensure iter-16 PR runs build/test pipelines with Spectre.Console dependencies restored on all agents.

tasks.name: 30.30 Resolve review feedback
tasks.details: Address reviewer comments on Spectre UX adoption, including API ergonomics, accessibility, and dependency concerns.

tasks.name: 30.40 Cross-platform runtime verification
tasks.details: Smoke-run Spectre UX on Windows, macOS, and Linux hosts (or emulated environments) to ensure spinner/prompt behaviour and logging stay stable.

tasks.name: 40 Validation & Delivery
tasks.details: Execute automated validation, manual UX review, and release readiness checks for Spectre.Console integration.

tasks.name: 40.10 Local lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format, dotnet build, dotnet test, and dry-run onboarding with Spectre UX to confirm no regressions.

tasks.name: 40.20 Expand unit coverage for Spectre UX
tasks.details: Audit NUnit suites to ensure new IUserInteraction signatures and StepResult flows are covered; add focused tests for spinner wrapper and summaries.

tasks.name: 40.30 Manual UX polish review
tasks.details: Run end-to-end onboarding with Spectre UX to validate welcome banner, spinner flow, prompts, and completion summary match design mockups.

tasks.name: 40.40 Squash/merge PR
tasks.details: After approvals and validation, squash-merge iter-16 PR into main and capture release notes for Spectre UX.

tasks.name: 50 Docs & Comms
tasks.details: Document Spectre UX changes, update onboarding guidance, and communicate rollout after merge.

tasks.name: 50.10 Post-merge validation + README updates
tasks.details: After merging iter-16, pull main, run quick smoke test, and refresh README/quick-starts with Spectre UX instructions.

tasks.name: 50.20 Update UX documentation & troubleshooting
tasks.details: Revise ux_polish.md follow-up notes, README troubleshooting, and support docs to explain Spectre UX controls and log retrieval.

tasks.name: 50.30 Share Spectre UX rollout update
tasks.details: Announce Spectre.Console UX launch to stakeholders (Slack/email), highlighting new experience, screenshots, and support guidance.

tasks.name: Publish v0.2.0 release from main
tasks.details: Tag the current main HEAD, run the release workflow, and confirm assets published. Update notes once complete.
